extendedInfo.description: Meet PoPo, the chubby panda who just can't get enough ice cream. Imagine his surprise when he wakes after a summer snooze to find the cheeky gorilla Uggi has stolen his icy treats! Roll the rotund little bear around each level and chase Uggi to the hole. You'll have to choose the best route if you want to collect all your missing ice creams though.Roll in the Hole may look super cute but thereâs more than enough challenge and outside-the-box puzzles here to keep players of all ages entertained in this super-addictive, family-fun adventure!**Runs beautifully on tablets**â¢ AMAZING LEVEL DESIGN - 72 incredibly varied and fun-to-play levels where grass, sand and ice will affect PoPo's roll. Master your environment to stay in the game!â¢ PERFECT CONTROLSâ¨- Playing as PoPo is a breeze, intuitive control of spin and direction means that anyone can have a go, you'll be a natural after just a few seconds. Choose to press either side of the screen or tilt the device.â¢ TO BOLDLY GO WHERE NO PANDA HAS GONE BEFOREâ¨- Follow the hilarious story that takes PoPo from the jungle into outer space!â¢ CHARISMATIC CHARACTERSâ¨- Control PoPo on his adventure and meet cute characters Uggi the Gorilla and Zappi the Alien.â¢ HILARIOUS SOUNDSâ¨- Cute and funny sound effects will put a smile on your face as you bounce and roll your way through the weird and wonderful worlds.** We have noticed that customers running OS 3.2 on their Motorola Xoom have had problems running this game on their device. We are investigating the issue, but advise updating your Xoom to OS 3.2.1 as soon as possible, which will fix this issue. **

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Atwinta Jerilong

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: I 3 starred every level months ago and I haven\'t played since.  Add more Levels.  Charge for it I don\'t care....  The game is too short as is
reviews.author: Tony Wirz

reviews.title: Dont respond to e-mails
reviews.comment: Decent game.  They dont respond to e-mails all youll get is a generic automatic message. Level 4-24 the lever does nothing making the level impossible so you cannot progress pass that point. Doesnt register touches often.  But when it does work the game is above average.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Please add more soon. This is fun! ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Locks up XOOM
reviews.comment: During start up, app freezes entire device. I have to hard reset.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sound setting doesn\'t save!
reviews.comment: The game is cute, but the sound doesn\'t stay off if you exit and re-enter.  This is a must feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why does it need access to contacts
reviews.comment: Ok game,  removing it as I don\'t understand why it needs access to my contacts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty fun game.
reviews.comment: Only tested a couple levels. I\'ll go back and play more since it\'s good to pass time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun, but won\'t remember sound settings. Needs an update and will give a better rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was fun,
reviews.comment: but I\'ve been stuck on 3-23 for days now. I think I\'m about done trying (I\'ve probably tried 500 times). Now it\'s a cause of frustration instead of relaxation. But it was fun while it lasted. Good game over all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: It\'s great on the HTC Sensation
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unpolished
reviews.comment: Feels like a lazy port. Not remembering sound settings is unforgivable. Also just not very interesting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tedious, sensitive, repetitive
reviews.comment: Nice graphics, but you have to go so slow, that it makes the game boring. First 20 levels or so are pretty much identical; again... boring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really enjoyed it.
reviews.comment: Great casual game that\'s hard not to love. Using touch controls when it gets too hard for a stage may help. Beat them all perfectly. New levels would be nice but definitely worth the price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: One of the BEST Android game out there.  Great graphics and extremely fun to play.  If you like Cut the Rope or Angry birds then you\'ll love this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Make it shut up
reviews.comment: Not even silencing the droid x killed the sounds. Menu options don\'t \"save\" no matter how many times I tried.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Controls like a barge
reviews.comment: If you like slow controls and boring levels do I have the game for you! Its frustrating yet easy if that\'s possible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not responsive
reviews.comment: The touch control is laggy and sometimes doesn\'t register a quick change of direction...nice idea for game and nice graphics ..on galaxy nexus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible perms
reviews.comment: I would uninstall this app for the horrible permissions if I didn\'t have lbe security installed to block it. Sorta fun for a little while though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash on load
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work on the galaxy nexus running version 4.0.3
reviews.author: A Google User
